photoeffects: My Colors Off, Vivid, Neutral, Sepia, Black & White, Positive Film, Lighter Skin, Darker Skin, Vivid Blue, Vivid Green, Vivid Red, Custom Color
weight: Approx. 17.3 oz. / 492g (Camera only) Approx. 19.0 oz. / 534g (Including the battery and memory card)
focusingrange: Normal: 1.3 ft. (40cm) - infinity (W), 4.3 ft. (1.3m) - infinity (T) Auto: 7.9 in. (20cm) - infinity (W), 2.8 ft. (85cm) - infinity (T) Macro: 7.9 in. - 2.3 ft. (20-70cm) (W), 2.8 ft. - 5.2 ft. (85cm - 1.6m) (T)
shootingcapacity: LCD Monitor on: Approx. 250 shots LCD Monitor off: Approx. 700 shots Approx: 310 shots when in Quick Shot mode (LCD monitor on)
continuousshooting: Normal: Approx. 1.9 shots/sec. (in P mode), Approx. 4.5 shots/sec. (in High-speed Burst HQ mode) AF: Approx. 0.7 shots/sec. (in P mode) LV: Approx. 0.7 shots/sec. (in P mode)
computerinterface: Hi-Speed USB 2.0 (Dedicated connector (female) with unified type of digital, audio and video)
exposurecontrolmethod: AE Lock (not available when shooting movies)
jpegcompressionmode: Still Image: Exif 2.3 JPEG, RAW (14 bit, CR2 (Canon Original)) Video: MOV (Image data: H.264; Audio data: Linear PCM (2 channel stereo)) Videos: MOV (Image data: H.264, Audio data: Linear PCM (Stereo))
numberofrecordingpixelsvideo: [iFrame Movie]: 1280 x 720 (30 fps) [Miniature Effect]: 1280 x 720 / 640 x 480 [Other than the above]: 1920 x 1080 (24 fps), 1280 x 720 (30 fps) /640 x 480 (30 fps)
whitebalancecontrol: Auto, Daylight, Cloudy, Tungsten, Fluorescent, Fluorescent H, Flash, Underwater, Custom1, Custom2
lcdmonitor: 3.0-inch TFT color LCD (Vari-angle type with wide-viewing angle)
videoout: Analog: NTSC or PAL, Digital: HDMI (HDMI mini connector)
shootingmodes: C1, C2, M, Av, Tv, P, Auto, SCN, Creative Filters, Movie
storagemedia: SD Memory Card, SDHC Memory Card, SDXC Memory Card
